sentence: Whether you know it or not , a mouse can be used to solve this riddle .
Wow , lad , that mouse is great .
Click on the mouse and then select the option you want , by right-clicking on the solution .

The mouse is a rodent , often considered to be a pest .

A computer mouse is a pointing device that detects two-dimensional motion relative to a surface .
